alert.note: Alert for Bladen (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:26AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Bladen County through 100 AM EDT... At 1226 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Ammon to near Elizabethtown. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Ammon, White Lake and Bladen County Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
